svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Food supply in a given year vs the height of men born in that year.
Caloric supply per capita per day
Source: Daily caloric supply per capita long-term - FAO (2017), University of Tuebingen: Height datahub (2015)
